page_title: Octor Affiliates | Partners Affiliation Program - Esportes da Sorte
page_description: Become an Octor affiliate and earn with the Partners program. We connect brands to influencers with complete management, biweekly payouts and 24/7 support.

hero.title: Partners Affiliate
hero.description: We are the largest Brazilian affiliate company and we work exclusively for the Esportes Gaming Brasil group. Today we are the unique channel for affiliation of the brands that make up the Group. From prospecting, negotiation, contract formalization, management and relationship. Together with Octor, you will be directly with the company, without any intermediary, enabling the best negotiations in the market. All this, with great security and transparency.
hero.click_here: Click here and talk to our affiliate manager

saque.title: Biweekly payouts
saque.description: Receive your earnings every 15 days, quickly and securely, without complications.

chat.title: Exclusive account manager for you
chat.description: Our manager will assist you on your journey with dedicated and personalized support.

google_seo.title: The most searched bet in Google in Brazil
google_seo.description: Stay ahead of the competition with the most popular bet in the country. You will be at the forefront representing the Most Popular Bet in the Country.

acordo.title: CPA and REV agreements

contrato.title: Formalized affiliation contract
contrato.description: Count on a formalized contract that guarantees the security and transparency of your partnership.

conversao.title: Conversion and Retention
conversao.description: We have one of the highest LTV in the Brazilian Market! And with a conversion rate of up to 60% (registration x FTD).

midia_kit.title: Media Kit
midia_kit.description: We will deliver a robust media kit, designed to boost your growth. In addition, we provide exclusive images and videos of our ambassadors â€” Today we have the largest cast of high-engagement personalities in the market. It's heavy content for you to use strategically.

pixel.title: Pixel Integration
pixel.description: For you who are focused on direct traffic, we will help you with the integration of your pixel via postback. Optimizing your campaign and lowering your costs.

grupo_info.title: Information Group
grupo_info.description: Communication channel with tips on funnels that convert the most, and assertive creatives for the moment and real-time updates on promotions we have on our sites.

bet_section.title: The most searched bet in Google in Brazil

how_to.title: How to become an affiliate
how_to.description:
Click on the become an affiliate link and fill in your personal information to create your account and access password.

After that, click on the contact us link and send your created username to our personalized support. So we can include you in our affiliate ecosystem.

In this same contact us link you will negotiate your commission plan, send data for contract formalization and share a bit of your strategy so we can help you with whatever is necessary.

In case of doubts, click on contact us and we will help you from start to finish in your affiliate process.

WELCOME!
